sqlMap.select: SELECT ROWNUM NUM, COURSECODE , YEAR , COURSENAME||'('||TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(COURSECODE,11,2))||'기)' COURSENAME, EDUCOUNT , CRSTYPE1 , EDUTARGET, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EDUFROM,'YYYYMMDD'),'MM.DD')||'~'||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EDUTO,'YYYYMMDD'),'MM.DD') EDUFROMTO, CASE WHEN CRSTYPE1 = '00003' THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQFROM,'YYYYMMDD'),'MM.DD')||DECODE(CRSTYPE1,'00003','~','-')||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQTO,'YYYYMMDD'),'MM.DD') ELSE '-' END REQFROMTO , BASEYYMM , DAYCOUNT EDUDAY, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_SYSTEMCODE WHERE CODEDIV LIKE '00021' AND CODE NOT LIKE '00000' AND CODE = A.LECROOMNO) LECROOMNO, (SELECT USERNAME FROM CMN_PUBWORKER WHERE JUMINNO = A.CHARGER) CHARGER FROM OPR_LECTURE A WHERE (SUBSTR(EDUFROM, 0, 6) LIKE #baseYYMM# AND CRSTYPE1 NOT LIKE '00003') OR (BASEYYMM LIKE #baseYYMM# AND CRSTYPE1 LIKE '00003') ORDER BY EDUFROM, EDUTO, COURSENAME

SELECT ROWNUM NUM, COURSECODE , YEAR , COURSENAME||'('||TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(COURSECODE,11,2))||'기)' COURSENAME, EDUCOUNT , CRSTYPE1 , EDUTARGET, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EDUFROM,'YYYYMMDD'),'MM.DD')||'~'||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EDUTO,'YYYYMMDD'),'MM.DD') EDUFROMTO, CASE WHEN CRSTYPE1 = '00003' THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQFROM,'YYYYMMDD'),'MM.DD')||DECODE(CRSTYPE1,'00003','~','-')||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQTO,'YYYYMMDD'),'MM.DD') ELSE '-' END REQFROMTO , BASEYYMM , DAYCOUNT EDUDAY, B.NAME LECROOMNO, C.USERNAME CHARGER FROM OPR_LECTURE A, (SELECT CODE, CODEDIV, NAME FROM SYS_SYSTEMCODE WHERE CODEDIV LIKE '00021' AND CODE NOT LIKE '00000' ) B, (SELECT JUMINNO, USERNAME FROM CMN_PUBWORKER WHERE ISADMIN LIKE 'Y' OR ISEDUCHARGER LIKE 'Y' ) C WHERE A.LECROOMNO = B.CODE(+) AND A.CHARGER = C.JUMINNO(+) AND YEAR = #year#
AND (CRSTYPE1 LIKE '00001' OR CRSTYPE1 LIKE '00004')
AND CRSTYPE1 LIKE '00002' AND CRSTYPE2 NOT LIKE '00004' AND CRSTYPE2 NOT LIKE '00005'
AND CRSTYPE1 LIKE '00002' AND CRSTYPE2 LIKE '00004'
AND CRSTYPE1 LIKE '00002' AND CRSTYPE2 LIKE '00005'
AND CRSTYPE1 LIKE '00003'
ORDER BY EDUFROM, EDUTO, COURSENAME
